title: Paradise that never was lives on in legend
deck: The Summer of Love never happened. Oh, something definitely happened in San Francisco 50 years ago this summer, but it wasn’t the idyllic frolic and utopian pastoral that is the popular mythology.

title: Mystery: Who is this (not Ben Fong-Torres) reporter from 1967?
deck:
Ben Fong-Torres likes the idea of being immortalized in a Summer of Love photo by rock photography legend Jim Marshall.
But the photo in Jim Marshall’s collection featuring a reporter identified as Fong-Torres — most recently published in The Chronicle’s Summer of Love magazine — is of another man, the real Fong-Torres insists.
